name: unseriousness
content:
unseriousness noun [U]
(NO INTENTION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of not being serious about achieving something: Their position is hard to defend, and suggests unseriousness or even apathy. They accuse political leaders of wilful unseriousness on national issues.
More examplesFewer examplesOfficials are disappointed by the government's apparent unseriousness over the diplomatic moves already initiated.

unseriousness noun [U]
(NO IMPORTANCE)
the fact of being funny, happy, or enjoyable, rather than being important or deserving respect: Don't let our unseriousness mislead you - this is a serious topic. They were offended by the film industry's unseriousness, by its capacity to entertain without edifying.
